segments.text: Have you find any job that you are interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve only find a few openings in my field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s not a very high demand for that kind of job , isn ’ t there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately not . If I can ’ t find anything in that field , then I could also work in the marketing field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea . You have plenty of experience in marketing , don ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , I saw a job in the paper this morning that you might be interested in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a job at an advertisement company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think they'd hire me ?
segments.speaker: S2
